Overview

Describe the project's purpose, goals, and the context in which it was built. This section sets the stage for the technical details that follow.

Framework: Playwright Language: TypeScript CI/CD: GitHub Actions Type: UI Automation

Responsibilities & Contributions

  • Designed and implemented an end-to-end automation framework.
  • Integrated test execution into a CI/CD pipeline with reporting.
  • Created reusable components and page objects for maintainability.
  • Improved test execution speed and reliability.

Technical Highlights

  • Parallelized execution reducing overall runtime by 60%.
  • Custom reporting pipeline producing HTML & Slack notifications.
  • Advanced selector strategy ensuring stability across UI changes.
  • Mocking network requests for isolated and deterministic tests.

Outcomes

Summarize measurable impact: reduced bugs, improved release confidence, reduced manual testing hours, or increased automation coverage.
